paragraphs.text: The Avatar relics are four ancient toys utilized in identifying Air Nomad Avatars at a young age. The four toys represent the four nations, and all were once the toys of previous Air Nomad Avatars.

paragraphs.body: After the death of an Avatar, permitting that the previous one was originally a ${link_0}, newborn Air Nomad infants are presented with thousands of toys, four of which are the relics. If the infant chooses to play with only these four toys, it is a strong sign that he or she might be the reincarnated Avatar, as the real Avatar is believed to choose the four toys most familiar to him or her.

paragraphs.body: This method of identifying the new Avatar is based on the real-world method of identifying the next reincarnation of Tulku Lama in Tibetan Buddhism.
